description:
These double layer socks reduce friction and prevent blisters whether you are running, working out or hiking. The inner layer pulls moisture away from the skin, while the outer layer allows maximum airflow.

  • Both layers are Dri-Wright II polyester, nylon and LYCRA®
  • Mesh panels provide air flow to keep your feet cool
  • Stabilizer zone in arches locks socks in place
  • Small fits kids shoe size 9-11.5, medium fits 12-2.5, large fits 3-6
name: WrightSock Coolmesh II Low Socks - Children to Youths
